class.name: AbilitySystemAbilityContainer
class.brief_description: Master container for an Ability System configuration, grouping abilities, effects, and attributes.
class.description:
[AbilitySystemAbilityContainer] serves as a data definition for a character archetype or class configuration. It holds references to: - Abilities to be granted. - Innate effects (passives) to be applied. - Initial attribute values (base stats). - Gameplay Cues to be registered.
This resource is typically applied to an [AbilitySystemComponent] upon initialization or class change.

members.member: List of [AbilitySystemCue] resources associated with this container. These cues listen for gameplay events.
List of [AbilitySystemAbility] resources that will be granted to the owner.
Dictionary mapping attribute names (StringName/String) to their initial base values (float). Example: { "health": 100.0, "mana": 50.0 }
List of [AbilitySystemEffect] resources that will be applied automatically (usually Infinite duration).
